name: My Fruit Juice Shop
description:
Build your own Fruit Juice Shop empire by using your management skills!

Make different - different juice choice of customer and earn coins. It's amazing FREE cook Fruit Juice addictive time management game!

How to Play?
=========
- You need to make juice as per customer choice.
- Give delivery before end time and earn coins.

Features:
========
- In this game as two mode. One is Free and one is career.
- Challenging levels.
- In career 8 different levels.
- There are so many different flavour juice.
- Amazing animation and sounds.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for become chief manager? Download Now....
